mapper.select: select record_id, record_sid, record_question_id, record_status, record_time, record_code_type from record order by record_id offset 20 * (${page_num}-1) limit 20
select record_id, record_sid, record_question_id, record_status, record_time, record_code_type, record_code from record where record_sid = #{sid};
select * from record where record_sid = #{sid} and record_question_id = #{question_id}
select * from record where record_id = #{record_id} and record_sid = #{sid} ;
mapper.insert: insert into record(record_sid, record_question_id, record_status, record_time, record_code, record_code_type) values (#{record_sid}, #{record_question_id}, #{record_status}, #{record_time}, #{record_code}, #{record_code_type})
mapper.select: select record_id, record_sid, record_code from ( select record_id, record_sid, record_code, row_number() over (partition by record_sid order by record_time desc) as ranking from record where record_question_id = #{question_id}) temp where temp.ranking = 1;
